USAGE: finder make <wordfile> -dict <dictionary> [--progress]
OPTIONS: 
    --progress, -p  show progress
USAGE: finder find <infile> -dict <dictionary> [-o <outfile>] [-split|-nosplit]
OPTIONS: 
    -o, --output <outfile>  write to file instead of stdout
    -split|-nosplit         (do not) split output
USAGE: finder help [-v]
OPTIONS: 
    -v, --version  show version
